title: Chopstick Cafe
typeOfFood: Ovo, Chinese, Japanese, Thai, Delivery, Take-out, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A low-scale Asian fusion restaurant and sushi bar in downtown offering Thai curries and dishes, Chinese and Japanese food, and even sandwiches. The menu states that you have a choice of "meat" with your entree, which you could ask for tofu. Nothing is veg specific but you could ask.
